name: Mobilexpress
tag_list: mobile, payment, mobile-payment, mobile-commerce, mobile-shopping, online-payment, alternative-payment-methods
overview:
Mobilexpress is a mobile shopping and payment platform.

Mobilexpress mainly focuses on two business lines: Mobile Shopping and Secure Online Mobile Checkout.

With Mobile Shopping, Mobilexpress enables customers to purchase goods from ads by sending the Mobilexpress code of the product via SMS to 3570 (our short code) or simply tapping the code into the Mobilexpress iPhone application. By doing so, not only does Mobilexpress let customers use their mobile phones anywhere any time to shop for products, but it also helps companies to convert their advertising into a direct mobile sales channel.

With Secure Online Mobile Checkout, Mobilexpress enables customers to use their Mobilexpress accounts (their mobile phone numbers and secure Mobilexpress passwords) to fast checkout while shopping online. All customers need to do is to choose “Pay by Mobilexpress”, tap in their mobile phone number and confirm their shopping via their mobile phones with their secure Mobilexpress passwords. This way, Mobilexpress makes shopping and payments easier, faster and more secure for customers while helping companies to significantly increase basket to sales conversion ratios.

Mobilexpress helps companies from all sectors, from retail to ticketing, from top-up to e-commerce companies to use its services to provide easy, fast and secure shopping and payment via mobile.

Registration at Mobilexpress is very easy and can be done at www.mobilexpress.com.tr, Mobilexpress iPhone app or at our Customer Service Line. For online payment, unregistered customers can even register right at the time of checking out with only inserting a few extra information such as their mobile phone number, a self-created secure password and their credit card information. For Mobile Shopping, our Customer Service Agents call customers back right away when our system receives an order from an unregistered customer, eliminating the possibility of losing a sales potential from an ad.
